snippet: The mortgage finance company is threatening to sue Richmond, Calif., if the city goes ahead with a plan to help homeowners whose homes are worth less than they owe.
lead_paragraph: The mortgage finance company is threatening to sue Richmond, Calif., if the city goes ahead with a plan to help homeowners whose homes are worth less than they owe.

headline.main: Firms Sue City Over Mortgage Plan
headline.print_headline: Firms Sue City Over Mortgage Plan
